div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1796 Kaswin, c. 140 km. NW of Teheran (anc. Rhagae), Media, 1964 Burial: c. 275 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 150 AR Alexander III: 40 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Paphus 1, Aradus 1, Mara- thus 1, Aradus or Marathus 8, Susa 1, Ecbatana 26, oriental imit. 2) Seleucus I: 43 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 2, Susa 3, Persepolis 1, Ecbatana 36, unc. eastern mint 1 as W SM 1626) 1 didr. (Ecbatana) 2 dr. (Persepolis, Ecbatana) Antiochus I: 2 tetradr. (Ecbatana) Disposition: dispersed Information from A. Spaer on the 88 specimens listed above. One coin of Antiochus I may be intrusive
